Game: Jake Power- Fireman Become a Fire-Fighting Hero! Play as Jake, helping him respond to emergencies and complete his dangerous missions. Fight fires, drive your own fire truck, and rescue people in danger to become a city hero. Demonstrate your fire-fighting abilities using the Nintendo DS stylus and microphone to complete fun mini-games. Unwind hoses, extinguish fierce fires, and respond to emergency calls quickly and safely. Make your fire truck bigger and better by adding new wheels, engines, sirens, and more. <1>http://images.launchbox-app.com/a07d2df7-a73a-442b-b267-1ccf4586bb55.png</1> http://images.launchbox-app.com/9b0b3822-0755-4d1e-826b-2165f4c6b64d.jpg http://images.launchbox-app.com/37eca434-13d5-45ea-80f2-f1dbcfdd5604.png
